content:
### New nodes
#### n8n node The [n8n node](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.n8n.md) allows you to consume the n8n API in your workflows.
#### WhatsApp Business Platform node The [WhatsApp Business Platform](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.whatsapp/index.md) node allows you to use the WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API in your workflows.
